mean_en: an arrangement by which a bank lends a person some money for a short time until that person can get the money from somewhere else, often so that they can buy another house before they sell their own
sentence: The bank offered me a bridging loan to buy a new house until I can sell my old one.
sentence_trans: 在我卖掉老房子买新房子前，银行为我提供了过渡性贷款。
